description:
A quick and easy way to browse the web from exhibition mode on your TouchPad!
Leave open your favorite website, any website, and have it stay open for as long as your TouchPad is docked in your Touchstone. News, Social Networking, Scores, its up to you!  Simply press Go!, enter the website you'd like to visit, and leave it be.  Something catch your eye, and you need to browse? Go for it! Back and Forward buttons are there so you can browse around to anywhere, and find your way back.
It's the web, from your dock, for as long as you're docked.  Also works as a simple browser when away from your Touchstone.
